message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. This might seem a bit generous, but remember, the value of money decreases with each round.
I think a 80/20 split in my favor is fair, considering the value of money is decreasing. This way we both get a good share before it depreciates too much.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a 45/55 split. This maintains a balance while accounting for the inflation. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
